description: Creates a managed endpoint. A managed endpoint is a gateway that connects Amazon EMR Studio to Amazon EMR on EKS so that Amazon EMR Studio can communicate with your virtual cluster.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the managed endpoint.

parameters.name: virtualClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the virtual cluster for which a managed endpoint is created.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of the managed endpoint.

parameters.name: executionRoleArn
parameters.description: The ARN of the execution role.

parameters.name: configurationOverrides
parameters.description: The configuration settings that will be used to override existing configurations. applicationConfiguration (list) --- The configurations for the application running by the job run. (dict) --- A configuration specification to be used when provisioning virtual clusters, which can include configurations for applications and software bundled with Amazon EMR on EKS. A configuration consists of a classification, properties, and optional nested configurations. A classification refers to an application-specific configuration file. Properties are the settings you want to change in that file. The classification within a configuration. properties (dict) --- A set of properties specified within a configuration classification. (string) --- (string) --- configurations (list) --- A list of additional configurations to apply within a configuration object. monitoringConfiguration (dict) --- The configurations for monitoring. managedLogs (dict) --- The entity that controls configuration for managed logs. allowAWSToRetainLogs (string) --- Determines whether Amazon Web Services can retain logs. encryptionKeyArn (string) --- The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the encryption key for logs. persistentAppUI (string) --- Monitoring configurations for the persistent application UI. cloudWatchMonitoringConfiguration (dict) --- Monitoring configurations for CloudWatch. The name of the log group for log publishing. logStreamNamePrefix (string) --- The specified name prefix for log streams. s3MonitoringConfiguration (dict) --- Amazon S3 configuration for monitoring log publishing. Amazon S3 destination URI for log publishing. containerLogRotationConfiguration (dict) --- Enable or disable container log rotation. The file size at which to rotate logs. Minimum of 2KB, Maximum of 2GB. The number of files to keep in container after rotation.

nested_params.name: applicationConfiguration
nested_params.description: The configurations for the application running by the job run.

nested_params.name: properties
nested_params.description: A set of properties specified within a configuration classification.

nested_params.name: configurations
nested_params.description: A list of additional configurations to apply within a configuration object.

nested_params.name: managedLogs
nested_params.description: The entity that controls configuration for managed logs.

nested_params.name: allowAWSToRetainLogs
nested_params.description: Determines whether Amazon Web Services can retain logs.

nested_params.name: encryptionKeyArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of the encryption key for logs.

nested_params.name: persistentAppUI
nested_params.description: Monitoring configurations for the persistent application UI.

nested_params.name: logGroupName
nested_params.description: The name of the log group for log publishing.

nested_params.name: logStreamNamePrefix
nested_params.description: The specified name prefix for log streams.

nested_params.name: s3MonitoringConfiguration
nested_params.description: Amazon S3 configuration for monitoring log publishing.

nested_params.name: logUri
nested_params.description: Amazon S3 destination URI for log publishing.

nested_params.name: containerLogRotationConfiguration
nested_params.description: Enable or disable container log rotation.

nested_params.name: rotationSize
nested_params.description: The file size at which to rotate logs. Minimum of 2KB, Maximum of 2GB.

nested_params.name: maxFilesToKeep
nested_params.description: The number of files to keep in container after rotation.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: The client idempotency token for this create call. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The tags of the managed endpoint. (string) --- (string) ---

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The output contains the ID of the managed endpoint.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The output contains the name of the managed endpoint.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The output contains the ARN of the managed endpoint.

nested_items.name: virtualClusterId
nested_items.description: The output contains the ID of the virtual cluster.
